title: What is a "Unique Takedown"?
body: What counts as a "Unique Takedown" in LoL? Just a kill, or an ultie kill or what?

replies.body: Do you have to get the kill or does an assist count? It would make a lot of runes bad for supports.
Unique takedown would be slaying an enemy champion for the first time.  So in Summoner's Rift, you would get a max of 5 takedowns.  Slay anyway you like.  :)
Porocles, any chance to add some sort of visual indicator to show who you've taken down and who you haven't?

Currently, I know you can track your progress by pressing Ctrl+C in game and mousing over that rune.  As far as an indicator, it is good feedback for our devs.  I recommend suggesting it over at our [gameplay ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance)boards!

Thanks for your response.

I know it shows your PROGRESS (X/5) But it doesn't show precisely WHICH champions, which, in hectic teamfights can be tough to track.

I'm not sure exactly who too direct this question to on the gameplay boards.  Should I do it in the runes feedback thread?  I figured you could use your magic Riot powers to pass it on :P
